alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 12:22PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch, sleet accumulations of around 1/2 of an inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Arkansas, southeast Oklahoma and northeast Texas. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
